name: Bone Tone
description:
Use A, S, D, Q, W, and E to play different notes. Match the color of the note to the color of the skeleton to damage/destroy them. If you die, press R to restart!

(This game was made in 72 hours for Amber Jam, including art & sounds. The theme was to make a game that can be described with two word that are only different by one letter -- like 'Bone' and 'Tone'.)
